name: Jump'n'Run Obstacle Sim. (alpha)
description:
My bigger game on Steam!

Jump'n'Run Obstacle Simulator is a platformer but it's not.

This is a prototype of an idea I got from Icoso's Geo Jame theme "the other side".

Noone probably will but I'd apprecciate it if you'd leave some feedback in the comments.

T + A / D to change selected Obstacle or Enemy

Specific action instructions for each enemy can be then found at the top of the screen.

The song playing during gameplay is a modbox remix of rude buster from someone on reddit who deleted their account so I can't credit.
